title: "use of alcohol and tobacco"
body:
You can't have tobacco in there and more riot.

** CUZ GRAVES DOESN'T HAVE A BLOODY CIGAR**

replies.body: Isn't Gragas drunk all the time? alcohol abuse. I don't understand why Graves doesn't have a cigar, although i don't understand why everyone acts like an idiot because he doesn't have one. Shikata ga nai

ikr.

but graves was the only cigar that ever mattered. Gragas uses a cheap knockoff made of his old toiletpaper
